parameters.name: x
parameters.label: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database.

parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A categorical variable form database.

parameters.name: iterationNumber
parameters.label: iterationNumber
parameters.desc: The iterationNumber shows the id of the testing dataset.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.label: alpha
parameters.desc: Additive smoothing parameter (0 for no smoothing)

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset

parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.
